title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
### 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend

#### Product Overview
Indulge in the luxury of natural aromatherapy with our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle set. This elegant collection of 16 soy wax tin candles is designed to bring a touch of serenity and natural fragrance to any space. Perfect as a thoughtful gift for your mother, wife, daughter, or friend, each candle is crafted with care using high-quality natural soy wax and essential oils to ensure a clean and long-lasting burn.

#### Features
- **Quantity:** 16 candles
- **Scents:** Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Blue Bell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, English Pear & Freesia
- **Material:** Natural soy wax
- **Essential Oils:** Yes, each candle is infused with pure essential oils for a genuine scent experience.
- **Burn Time:** Each candle burns for approximately 18-20 hours, providing ample time to enjoy the soothing aromas.
- **Container Type:** Durable tin cans that are recyclable and can be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations.
- **Intended Recipients:** Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
- **Safety Instructions:** Keep out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

#### Why Choose Our Aromatherapy Candles?
- **Natural and Eco-Friendly:** Made with natural soy wax, these candles are a sustainable and eco-friendly choice. Soy wax is biodegradable and burns cleaner than traditional paraffin wax.
- **Diverse Fragrances:** With 16 different scents, there's a fragrance for every mood and occasion. Whether you prefer the calming aroma of lavender or the invigorating scent of peppermint, this set has it all.
- **Perfect Gift:** The variety of scents and the elegant packaging make this set an ideal gift for any special occasion, from birthdays to Mother's Day.
- **Portable and Convenient:** The small tin cans are easy to carry and perfect for travel, making these candles a great addition to any home or office.

#### Additional Uses
- **Home Decor:** The tin cans are not only functional but also stylish, adding a touch of elegance to your home decor.
- **Relaxation:** The soothing scents are perfect for creating a relaxing atmosphere, making these candles ideal for meditation, yoga, or a peaceful evening at home.
- **Repurposing:** After the candles have burned out, the tins can be reused as small planters, storage containers, or unique home decor items.

#### Customer Reviews
- "Absolutely love the variety of scents! Each one is so unique and delightful. The candles burn evenly and the tins are super cute." – Sarah M.
- "I bought this set as a gift for my mom, and she was thrilled! The packaging is beautiful, and the quality of the candles is excellent." – Emily W.
- "These candles are amazing! They smell wonderful, burn cleanly, and the tins are perfect for repurposing. Highly recommend!" – John D.

#### Order Now
Treat yourself or a loved one to the calming and uplifting experience of our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle set. Order today and enjoy the natural beauty of these handcrafted candles.

---

Thank you for choosing our aromatherapy candles. We hope they bring joy and tranquility to your home.
